name: Haunted Investigation
description:
Are you ready to face your fears? Haunted Investigation is a heart-pumping horror game that will test your bravery and keep you on the edge of your seat. This singleplayer/multiplayer game is designed to bring players together in a spine-tingling exploration of an abandoned mansion filled with supernatural mysteries.



Whether you choose to play alone or another friend, Haunted Investigation will immerse you in a world of terror and suspense. You'll have to work together to uncover the dark secrets that lie within the mansion, while also solving puzzles and avoiding deadly traps.



But be warned: this game is not for the faint of heart. With a variety of scares that will induce real-life fear, Haunted Investigation will keep you on your toes at all times. Our unique 3D sounds and jumpscares will leave you breathless, while the hauntingly beautiful graphics will transport you to another world. You'll feel like you're actually inside the mansion, searching for clues, solving puzzles and trying to survive.



One of the most exciting features of Haunted Investigation is its multiple endings. Depending on the choices you make throughout the game, you'll unlock different outcomes and discover new secrets. Will you be able to unravel the mysteries of the mansion and escape with your life? Only the bravest will find out.

If you're a fan of horror games, Haunted Investigation is a must-play. With its immersive gameplay, spine-chilling scares, and multiple endings, it's sure to keep you entertained. So gather your friends, turn down the lights, and get ready for an unforgettable horror experience. Are you brave enough to enter the mansion?
